title: Audeus: Text to Speech Reader
description: Read aloud any PDF, Google Doc, Email, Word doc, webpage, article, and text with our text-to-speech (TTS) app to save time and boost productivity. Audeus text-to-speech (TTS) works where you work, and syncs your reading progress across all your devices. AI Voice Reader from Audeus comes with lifelike voices to help keep you in flow with over 150+ voices & 50+ languages.
